Sentence: All that glitters is not gold.
Options:
A. The wife told the husband that since she is in charge of the kitchen, the family will eat what she makes or go hungry.
B. The life of royals looks glamorous from afar but it is not as happy and fun as it looks.
C. The parents have been living happily ever since they decided not to go through the divorce.
D. The manager saw that Silvy was passing on her clients for hair appointments to other professionals but was showing up for tips; she decided to fire her the next time.
Label: B

Sentence: All that glitters is not gold.
Options:
A. The baby looks as snug as a bug in a rug next to her mother.
B. The boy who cried wolf got his comeuppance once the wolves really came.
C. You can't write from an inkless pen.
D. The journalist thought the life of the famous actress was extraordinary, only to realize later that it was not what it looks like.
Label: D
